item.title: Windows SubSystem for Linux
item.description: Windows Subsystem for Linux USL2 How-To Guide of Installation.(Ubuntu) **WSL2 **was announced at Microsoft Build 2019. WSL2 features a Linux kernel running inside Windows 10 and is built on the core technology of Hyper-V to provide better Linux application support and improved file performance. Transitioning to WSL2 is seamless. This is a Step by Step guide on how to install Ubuntu on your Windows 10 Machine. Turn On Windows Subsystem for Linux on Windows OS After WSL 2.
